notes: Apr-Dec 2026: Main R6,796, Adult R6,489, Child R2,078
Jan-Mar 2026: Main R6,198, Adult R5,917, Child R2,118

network_hospitals: Any private hospital approved by the Scheme
exclusions: Reconstructive treatment and surgery unless part of PMB
Breast reduction or enlargement and gynaecomastia
Otoplasty for bat ears, blepharoplasty (eyelid surgery) and treatment of ptosis (droopy eyelids)
Treatment, surgery and procedures for obesity
Infertility-related treatments, procedures and/or tests unless part of PMB
Ultra-high cost treatments, experiments, or practices
Healthcare services related to alcohol, drug or solvent abuse
Wilful participation in war, terrorism, rioting, civil commotion, rebellion or uprising
Injuries sustained or healthcare services received in country at war
Healthcare services related to nail disorders except where required as part of a defined benefit or under the Prescribed Minimum Benefits
notes: Unlimited hospital cover. We pay up to 200% of the Discovery Health Rate (DHR) or Classic rate and up to 100% of the DHR for essential care
Payment is subject to the Scheme authorizing your hospital stay
Upfront payments for in-hospital procedures performed outside the Day Surgery Network. We pay up to 200% of DHR and you pay the balance

procedures.notes: Unlimited if performed in Day Surgery Network, R4,650 upfront payment outside network
Unlimited if performed in Day Surgery Network, R4,650 upfront payment outside network
Unlimited if performed in Day Surgery Network, R4,650 upfront payment outside network
Unlimited if performed in Day Surgery Network, R4,650 upfront payment outside network
Radiology, physiotherapy, paraments, biokinetics. R5,020 upfront payment if admitted to hospital
Functional knee procedures, hysteroscopy (except for pre-ovulatory diagnostics/lysis), scopes for nasal sinuses, ankle and wrist. R11,500 upfront payment if admitted to hospital

procedures.procedure_name: Medial epicondylitis (golfer's elbow) and/or lateral epicondylitis (tennis elbow)
procedures.notes: Spinal surgery (back and neck), joint replacements. R23,700 upfront payment if admitted to hospital

procedures.procedure_name: Cataract surgery at a network provider
procedures.notes: We pay the full amount at the agreed rate at a network facility for cataract surgery performed by a doctor who is part of the Scheme's value-based network

Members 13 years and older: pay upfront R1,590, Members under 13 years: pay upfront R1,550. We cover the rest of the hospital dental surgery fees for other (a defined list applies). We pay up to 100% of the DHR on the Classic Priority Plan

modules.title: Medical Savings Account
modules.description: 25% of your contributions allocated to your MSA for day-to-day medical expenses

modules.title: Above Threshold Benefit (ATB)
modules.description: Once MSA is depleted, you pay first R10,100 of day-to-day claims before ATB covers 100% of Discovery Health Rate

modules.title: Oncology Care Programme
modules.description: Comprehensive cancer cover including high-cost and biological cancer treatment. Oncology Benefit up to R50,000 for treatment costs above the cover amount

day_to_day.structure: MSA covers day-to-day expenses. After MSA is depleted, you pay the first R10,100 (annual threshold) before Above Threshold Benefit covers 100% of Discovery Health Rate

gp_visits.network: Any GP in Discovery Health Rate network

specialist_visits.notes: Covered at 100% of Discovery Health Rate from MSA and ATB

medicine.acute: From MSA and ATB at 100% of SEP or Discovery Health Rate
medicine.chronic: From Chronic benefits at network pharmacy

dentist.notes: R2,500 per family for antenatal classes

optometry.notes: Covered at 100% of Discovery Health Rate

chronic.notes: We cover you in full for approved chronic medicine on our medicine list (formulary). Medicine covered on network pharmacies at 100% of Discovery Health Rate. Chronic Drug Amount (CDA) is the monthly maximum you can claim based on your plan type - applies to chronic medicine for the 27 CDL conditions

oncology.notes: Oncology Care Programme available. If we approve your cancer treatment, we pay 100% for approved cancer costs in full. Oncology Benefit provides up to R50,000 if your treatment costs more than the cover amount. Advanced Illness Benefit available for appropriate end-of-life clinical and psychological services

maternity.antenatal_visits: Unlimited consultations with GP or midwife, ultrasound scan, oral and mental translucency test (10-20 wks), genetic counselling at the rate per visit for 30-50 wks, blood tests and vaccinations at 100% DHR
maternity.delivery_cover: Unlimited hospital cover for baby delivery. GP and specialists to help after birth covered under our Postnatal care
maternity.notes: Comprehensive maternity care. Antenatal care consultations covered. Enhanced maternity support via Parent Sense app. Pre and postnatal care. Nurture at Home: If baby is admitted at Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU), you qualify for additional neonatal support
